roleset.name: having a monopoly (Watch out for non-events!)

roles.note: If it's a spatial feature, it's NOT an event! Call it .YY!

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE
example.text: Remember in the 80s when the next ice age was around the corner and we were all going to freeze to death ?

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WN eventive noun lexicon, corner.01. No VNcls.

example.name: both args
example.text: At harvest time his corner of the market for olive presses paid off because he then rented them out "at any rate which he pleased," making a lot of money and
example.arg: of the market for olive presses
